text: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

translation.en: And the magicians came to Pharaoh. They said, "Indeed for us is a reward if we are the predominant
translation.id: Dan para pesihir datang kepada Fir'aun. Mereka berkata, "(Apakah) kami akan mendapat imbalan, jika kami menang
